item.title: Vegetation shade from Landsat 8 satellite data
item.description: Landsat 8 Surface Reflectance measures the fraction of incoming solar radiation reflected from Earth’s surface to the Landsat sensor. Surface reflection measurements can be used to determine the type of surface. The Landsat 8 available measurements are shown in the table below. OLI and TRIS sensors The visible bands (bands 2-4) are 12 bit images with Digital Number (DN) values ranging between 0 and 4,095 associated with each pixel.
